channel.title: Need help, getting in a server
channel.description: Well I've been searching for about 2 hours trying to get a server, but everything I get is the server is probably down, which I know it isn't, can someone give me a SIMPLE guide to working moparscape, I looked on google but everything is complicated, they tell me to download something I do, then it doesn't explain what to do with the downloaded files next. What do I do with the servers download files? How do I get in a server? How do I do anything! I need serious help.

item.title: Need help, getting in a server
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

try logging in from here http://client.silabsoft.org/client3.php and get servers from http://www.mmorpgtoplist.com/runescape

hope tht helps

Read full topic

item.source: Need help, getting in a server

item.title: Need help, getting in a server
item.dc:creator: @Yodoxin Yodoxin
item.description:
@Yodoxin wrote:

If you’re downloading server files you’re not downloading the client to a playable server, but the makings of one. You can’t find playable servers on MoparScape because advertising isn’t allowed on here, but if you look on the server status page (http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php) and click on one of the servers it should come up with a page that has information on how you’d go about playing it.

[I am assuming you’ve posted in the wrong forum]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, getting in a server
